participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Compassionate and dedicated, Emily is someone who values helping others and is very passionate about animal welfare.
participant_1.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Resilient and athletic, Jake is friendly and has a strong sense of determination, especially after facing challenges in his career.
participant_2.background: i love playing softball. i work in the insurance business. my father is in the army. my mom passed away when i was young. i recently was fired and had to get a new job.

content.text: did you do charities at hs   i am volunteering at a bunny rescue center
